ru.ifmo.ctddev.shah.implementor

Class Implementor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.ifmo.ctddev.shah.implementor.Implementor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Impler, JarImpler

    public class Implementor
extends java.lang.Object
implements JarImpler
    Class implements JarImpler Class extends classes and interfaces. Call implement(Class, java.io.File) will produce java file in directory Calling implementJar(Class, java.io.File) will produce jar file with implementation Can used by command line(more in main(String[])).

    • Method Detail

      • implementJar

        public void implementJar(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                         java.io.File jarFile)
                  throws ImplerException
        Description copied from interface: JarImpler
        Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

        Generated class full name should be same as full name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

        Specified by:
        implementJar in interface JarImpler
        Parameters:
        token - type token to create implementation for.
        jarFile - target .jar file.
        Throws:
        ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

      • createJar

        private void createJar(java.io.File jarFile,
                       java.io.File root,
                       java.lang.String relativePath,
                       java.io.File implFile)
                throws ImplerException
        Create new jar file in specific directory. Create new jar file on path jarFile. Add a new entry representing class file implFile.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - name of jar file
        root - working directory
        relativePath - entry for jar
        implFile - implemented file
        Throws:
        ImplerException - when jar file cannot be created or cannot compile implementation

      • compileFile

        private void compileFile(java.io.File root,
                         java.io.File implFile)
                  throws ImplerException
        Compile java file in root directory.
        Parameters:
        root - working directory
        implFile - file to compile
        Throws:
        ImplerException - when cannot compile file

      • implement

        public void implement(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                      java.io.File root)
               throws ImplerException
        Description copied from interface: Impler
        Produces code implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

        Generated class full name should be same as full name of the type token with Impl suffix added. Generated source code should be placed in the correct subdirectory of the specified root directory and have correct file name. For example, the implementation of the interface List should go to $root/java/util/ListImpl.java

        Specified by:
        implement in interface Impler
        Parameters:
        token - type token to create implementation for.
        root - root directory.
        Throws:
        ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

      • checkUsage

        private static int checkUsage(java.lang.String[] args)
        Verify parametrs of launch
        Parameters:
        args - launch parametrs
        Returns:
        0 if parametrs are correct, -1 otherwise

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Implement class from arguments. If first argument equals "-jar" then call implementJar(Class, File) else call implement(Class, File).

        ImplementJar usage: -jar className fileName.jar

        Implement usage: className workingDirectory

        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments

      • implementConstructors

        private void implementConstructors(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                   java.lang.String implClazzName,
                                   java.lang.StringBuilder writer)
                            throws ImplerException
        Generate implementation of constructors. Generate all possible public and protected constructors matching super class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - implemented class
        implClazzName - generated class name
        writer - where implemetation is written
        Throws:
        ImplerException - if there are no public or protected constructors in super class

        Parameters:

      • implementMethods

        private void implementMethods(java.lang.Class<?> loadedClass,
                              java.lang.StringBuilder writer)
        Generate implementation for all class methods.

        writer - where implementation is written

      • loadAllMethods

        private void loadAllMethods(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                            boolean addAbstract)
        Searches all methods suitable for options. Method browse all methods in class and his super classes and interfaces. If addAbstract is true then call addMethod else call removeMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method) on method.
        Parameters:
        clazz - class for search
        addAbstract - if addAbstract is true add methods; remove otherwise.

      • removeMethod

        private void removeMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Remove method from map if exists. If method with same signature was added before to map and current method isn't abstract then removing old method from map.
        Parameters:
        method - Method

      • addMethod

        private void addMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Add method if it is abstract. If method was added before than exceptions and access modifiers are merged with current method.
        Parameters:
        method - method

      • getMethodSignature

        Returns:

      • getParametrsImplementation

        private java.lang.String getParametrsImplementation(java.lang.reflect.Parameter[] parameters,
                                                    boolean onlyNames)
        Returns string representing array of parametrs. If boolean parametr is true then generate string without type of paramets; and within type otherwise.
        Parameters:
        parameters - parametrs for implement
        onlyNames - generate representing with types or names
        Returns:
        string representing parametrs
